page.title: 11HOME LIFE (CONTINUED)
page.content:
THE LADY IN NUMBER ONE HAS LIVED THERE FOR 14YRS. HER 2 CHILDREN GO TO{PRIORY {HALL, KENILWORTH SCHOOL}BY SCHOOL TRANSPORT. SHE LIKES GARDENING, WALKING AND FISHING. SHE IS A ROMAN CATHOLIC AND GOES TO{ST. FRANCIS R.C. {CHURCH IN KENILWORTH.}HER HUSBAND IS A CIVIL SERVANT.
{HONILEY THIS IS A SMALL VILLAGE WITH A POPULATION OF ABOUT 60 PEOPLE. MANY OF THEM ARE RETIRED. IT IS QUIET, ALTHOUGH THERE IS SOME NOISE FROM LOW FLYING AIRCRAFT. THERE IS MAINS WATER AND ELECTRICITY BUT SEWAGE IS BY SEPTIC TANK AND BOTTLED CALOR GAS IS USED. PAPERS, POST AND MILK ARE DELIVERED. THERE ARE NO SHOPS AND PEOPLE TRAVEL TO{HASELEY {KNOB, WARWICK, LEAMINGTON SPA AND {KENILWORTH FOR SHOPPING.
